item.title: TOGETHER
item.description: The installation requires and encourages participants to work together. We can only solve global environmental issues together.

item.title: PHALE
item.description: “Between 5 million and 13 million tonnes of plastic leak into the world’s oceans every year.

item.title: THE ENGINE ROOM
item.description: A commissioned piece for SONY MUSIC. An Audio / Visual installation to raise awareness over Mental Health Awareness Week.
